1.title: It begins..

11.content: and now, where will you shrink?
11.title: 1 inch

choices: Can't worry about that, one of your roommates is comming
111.content: Your name was Jim, you were 22. You were unemployed, but had an interview set up for this afternoon. You resently moved into a house that was already occupied 5 attractive women, who were all between the ages 22-26. You woke up, got some breakfast, and then sat on the couch by the window, and watched some T.V. You heard some footsteps coming our way, but before you saw who it was, you felt tingly, and closed your eyes for a while, then you opened them, and everything was bigger. "What? did I shrink?" you asked. what caused this?
111.title: Home

112.content:
You are the new student in school, having just moved from across the country. You’re name is David and you are 18 years old.

Soon after moving, you made friends with Cassidy, the typical blonde, sexy popular girl and your new next door neighbor. She’s ditzy and oblivious to how rude she is, but has a great body, even considering how much junk she eats. She’s a cheerleader, has 2 gym classes and 1 swimming class, and wears the same blue crop top, basketball shorts, and hot pink sneakers every day. Her hair is curly, spiraling down to just above her waist, and her eyes are a deep blue, pairing nice with her light skin and blue outfit.

During your first day at school, at lunch, you meet Abigail, the nerdy, artsy girl with a gross sense of humor. Abby wears small framed glasses and lets the bangs of her dark brown hair flow halfway down her forehead. She ties her hair into three braids that go just below her neck before stopping. Every day, she wears blue jeans and a sweatshirt, both of which fit snugly around her slightly plump ass, breasts, and stomach. She adorns long black boots with zippers on the side, with green paint splattered on them from art class. She also participates in the school’s Marching Band.

Abigail introduces you to her friend Samantha. Samantha is short and thin, with light brown hair that grows straight down to the sides of her cheeks. Samantha wears large, circular glasses, a dress, and sweatpants, along with socks and sandals. Samantha is self-reserved, and gets easily embarrassed, which turns out to be quite a problem for her, since she gets gassy when she’s nervous. She doesn’t have any particularly specific or unique traits, but still is cute and funny if she decides to talk to you.

While at school, you shrink while talking to...
112.title: Shrunken in High School

14.content: and now, where will you shrink?
14.title: 1 foot

choices: Locker Rooms. Alot of sweaty women post workout.
Workout Area. Alot of currently sweaty women.
Yoga Session. Less sweat but alot of different poses.
143.content:
It was a day like any other to you. Waking up in the morning and heading off to work. You worked at a gym that frequently had gender-specific days, and today was the female one. Male workers were still allowed to come but all workers, in general, had been screened to make sure they wouldn't do something stupid. The thing is, they didn't think of the possibility of someone liking the smell of people working out, of all things, which is a category you fell under. You never told anyone but secretly relished in the smell of sweat that came off the female patrons as they worked out with you as a spotter.

Anyway, back to the now. As you opened the door you were greeted by one of your co-workers at the front desk. She said hi, you said hi back, standard formalities. Before you went into the back however, you decided to use the washroom. You went into the stall and right before you closed the door you felt a sense of vertigo swing over you as your world spun. When the burst of nausea ceased, you noticed you had shrunk all the way to a foot, not even reaching most people's knees unless they were really short.

Your first thought was to run out of the washroom, so run out you did. Thankfully it was women's only day so you didn't encounter any giants on your way out. When you got out a long pair of legs strode right in front of you. Right before you called out, the smell of sweat coming from her had you entranced. It wasn't like you were 2 inches tall, subject to die at the flick of a toe. Perhaps you could have some fun and not have to get someone's attention right away.

With this thought in mind, you headed to...
143.title: Working at the Gym.

info.brief_description: Shrunk down on accident, you are suddenly forced into situations that are very unpleasant.
info.description:
You don't know why or how but you were shrunk. Now you have to survive, but everyone around you usually fails to notice you and you get stuck in unpleasant situations constantly.
Examples include, you are forced to endure feet, butts, and all sorts of things in between.

This 18+ story

Feel free to add entries, but be aware if I deem them too short or not fitting, I may change them.

This is my first thing im making on writing.com so hopefully this will be fun :)

RULES:
Female giantess interactions only, the only male interactions allowed are minor, such as talking to someone, or carrying a tiny somewhere.

Basically anything goes, however the main character is immortal and does not die, they flatten instead.(this can be subject to change if i
deem your entry is a good end and the path went on for long enough.)

I want each path to go on for a good amount before you try and add any ends, certain exceptions apply if I think it fits.

Having a willing tiny go through this stuff is allowed As well. The tiny doesn't have to hate it

Rules may be added later as I deem fit, and decide on more.

I hope you enjoy :D
